## ImageGenerationRequest.safetyFilterLevel property

Adds a filter level to Safety filtering. Supported values are: \* "block\_most" : Strongest filtering level, most strict blocking \* "block\_some" : Block some problematic prompts and responses \* "block\_few" : Block fewer problematic prompts and responses

**Signature:**

```typescript
safetyFilterLevel?: "block_low_and_above" | "block_medium_and_above" | "block_only_high";
```
